short_notes:
‣ Bug Fixes and Improvements
‣ You can now use the new grok-imagine-image and grok-imagine-image-pro models for ImageGen mode!
‣ Image editing and video generation modes coming soon!
long_notes: Hey guys! This update fixes bugs that prevented you from using the brand new grok-imagine-image and grok-imagine-image-pro models in this shortcut, and fixes other bugs I found related to error handling. I am also in the process of developing additional modes for image editing and video generation here! Enjoy!
